ai-iti89:1.1_0: For this was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti89:2.1_0: “Mendicants, overcome and overwhelmed by three things that oppose the true teaching, Devadatta is going to a place of loss, to hell, there to remain for an eon, irredeemable.
